code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{deleteTask,editTask,toggleTask}from'../features/tasks/taskslice';import{FaEdit,FaTrash,FaCheck}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Tasklist=()=>{const tasks=useSelector(state=>state.tasks);const dispatch=useDispatch();const[editId,setEditId]=useState(null);const[editText,setEditText]=useState('');const handleEdit=task=>{setEditId(task.id);setEditText(task.text);};const handleEditSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();dispatch(editTask({id:editId,text:editText}));setEditId(null);setEditText('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:editId===task.id?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleEditSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:editText,onChange:e=>setEditText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCheck,{})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{textDecoration:task.completed?'line-through':'none'},onClick:()=>dispatch(toggleTask(task.id)),children:task.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaEdit,{onClick:()=>handleEdit(task),style:{cursor:'pointer',marginLeft:'10px',color:'yellow'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTrash,{onClick:()=>dispatch(deleteTask(task.id)),style:{cursor:'pointer',marginLeft:'10px',color:'red'}})]})},task.id))});};export default Tasklist;
